11411221.content:
Nick was too busy thinking to notice that they had already arrived at town hall where Mayor Lionheart spent most of his day working. Nick exited the police cruiser and began to walk up the steps to the town hall, when he heard the sound of a grown man bawling his eyes out. Nick turned around and saw Chief Bogo in the back seat kicking and screaming to be let out out of the vehicle. With a heavy sigh, Nick opened the car door and unbuckled the Chief. He had already forgotten that the Chief was completely helpless on his own and needed someone to do even basic things for him.

Nick opened the large doors to the town hall and walked huffing and puffing, with Bogo toddling in after him. Nick had spent the past ten minutes trying to heave Bogo up the steps while the Chief acted as dead weight. Once he had regained his breath, Nick began to walk up to the front desk. All the while, thoughts of why Nick brought Bogo hear began to swirl around in his mind. The mayor had no children of his own, nor had he even babysat when he was younger. No, in fact the reason that Bogo was brought here was a secret that only certain officers of the ZPD knew about. Mayor Leodore Lionheart was..

"Hello? Sir?" Interjected a nasally voice. It was the secretary at the front desk calling Nick's attention.

"Oh, sorry" he apologized. "Nick Wilde, ZPD. I have a special guest for the mayor in his private quarters"

The secretary's eyes shot to Bogo who was leaning on the desk for stability. "Yes right away sir." She pressed one of the many buttons on the intercom and said, "Mr. Lionheart, Nick Wilde is here and he's brought a special guest for a visit in private quarters."
After a few seconds of some shuffling sounds, the mayor's could be heard responding, "Ah yes. Let them in. Let them in."

The secretary gestured to a door at the far end of the left wing of the building. "Go all the way down the hall and it should be the door at the very end." She said while getting back to her computer.

Nick grabbed Bono's hand and helped him toddle all the way down the hallway. Once they got to the very end, Nick knocked on the large door and waited for a response. From inside, Nick heard the mayor say "Come in." Without hesitation Nick turned the doorknob and pushed the door open. He quickly dragged Bogo inside, and shut it however, because the mayor was very keen on keeping this room private. Inside was the reason that Nick had brought Chief Bogo here in the first place.

The walls were painted with a mural of the sky, complete with birds and planes soaring through it. The furniture consisted of beanbag chairs, a foam puzzle mat, an oversized playpen, and a giant highchair. Scattered around the room were various toys that included, wooden blocks, various plush toys, and a set of action figures. And in the very center of the room was the mayor of Zootopia himself, in nothing but an oversized baby diaper that was adorned with push animals, and wooden blocks. That's right. Leodore Lionheart was an avid adult baby.

Leodore, was sprawled out on the ground being adored by his caretaker Tyler, a young lion the Leodore had hired in place of his previous sheep assistant. When he saw Nick and Bogo he stood up and welcomed them to his nursery.

" Nick, Bogo, it's a pleasure having you here." He said as if nothing was abnormal. "But why are you here? I don't remember asking for you to stop by"

11522111.content:
Lionheart was walking through a laboratory alongside his new assistant Tyler, who was a lion just like him except skinnier and without a muscular build. After the whole Bellwether incident he had decided not to avoid sheep for the time being.

The two of them were currently following Dr. Honey Badger who was filling them in on the details. "As you can see we're all hard at work, and you'll be pleased to know we've already managed to create a small sample of the youth serum." The lion let out an impatient sigh, "Yes I know that's why I'm here Dr. Honey Badger. Now if you can please show it to me I want to see it with my own eyes." The doc fumbled with her clipboard before replying, "Yes sir it's right over here."

She led them over to a table with beakers and test tubes, pointing to a medium sized flask containing a blue liquid. "This is what we have managed to make so far."

Lionheart reached down and picked up the flask, lightly tapping a claw against it curiously. "Have you tested it yet? Does it work?"

"Of course and based on the tests we ran the youth serum reverses the aging process of the drinker at an accelerated rate, returning them physically to a younger age" Dr. Honey Badger explained, "So yes it does work."

"And they still have their adult minds right? They don't lose their memories?" Lionheart asked with a bit of fear in his voice.

The badger stumbled over her words, "Well we've only regressed the test subjects by five or seven years and there was no sign of mental degradation. However we don't know if that holds true if someone regresses as far back as infanthood" she admitted as the lion shivered slightly at the last word, thought not out of fear but excitement.

"That's a risk I'm willing to take" Lionheart said before putting the flask to his lips and taking a drink.

"Sir what are you doing? Stop, the more you drink the younger you'll get" she panicked.

The lion ignored her and continued to drink heavily from the flask until it was half empty before setting it down on the table. Lionheart then clutched his stomach as he felt the serum take effect and his body began to regress. Dr. Honey Badger and Tyler then watched as the thirty five year old adult lion began to grow younger right before their eyes. In a matter of seconds he was thirty years old and fifteen seconds after that he was a young man of twenty four. Pretty soon Lionheart was a teenager again, going through a reverse puberty as he headed back into childhood. At nine years old the youthening lion had all but disappeared into his suit which was now way too big for him. After that there was no sigh of movement from the pile of clothes and she was afraid Lionheart had regressed out of existence when the pile suddenly stirred.

Tyler then kneeled down and quickly undid the buttons on the suit's jacket, opening it up to reveal a two year old baby lion cub lying on his back.

"Thank you Tyler, now I can see again" Lionheart grinned before sticking his thumb in his mouth and sucking on it.

"Mayor Lionheart! You're...you're a baby" replied a shocked Dr. Honey Badger.

"I know doctor, I wanted this to happen" he admitted without a hint of shame.

Lionheart then...

"I will explain everything, but first Tyler could you fetch the bag from the car?" Lionheart asked his assistant.

"Right away sir" Tyler said before leaving the room.

Fifteen minutes later he returned carrying a black duffel bag. Setting it down on the floor beside Lionheart he opened it up and began pulling out an assortment of toddler sized clothes, changing supplies and an unopened package of baby sized disposable diapers.

"Excellent now the reason why I wanted you to create a youth serum was because I've always secretly wanted to be a baby again. It all started when I first became mayor of Zootopia, the stress of running such a big city eventually got to me. But rather then just resigning I was able to manage my stress by mentally regressing and acting babyish in my limited free time. I did it all sucking on pacifiers, drinking out of a bottle, wearing and using diapers."

At this point Tyler pulled out and unfolded a changing mat setting it on the floor. He then picked the lion cub up from the pile of clothes and laid him down it.

"However while I liked being an adult baby I could never truly enjoy myself for the simple fact that I was still an adult in body. I wanted to physically be a baby again so I could enjoy everything to the fullest, especially my diapers"

The older lion used a claw to rip open the package and removed one of the diapers. Unfolding it with the shake of his hand he then lifted Lionheart by the legs and placed it underneath him, setting him down on the crinkly padding. He purred loudly as Tyler sprinkled baby powder on his crotch and bottom and rubbed it in with his paw.

"So there you have it. I trust that you'll keep this conversation of ours a secret because if you tell anyone I'll deny everything. As for explaining my sudden regression to the public I'll just feign ignorance and let them form their own theories. There will be an investigation by the police but I'm confident they won't find anything" Lionheart finished explaining as Tyler threaded his tail through the back of the diaper before pulling the front up between his legs and taping up the sides.

Dr. Honey Badger just stood there as she attempted to process everything her regressed employer just told her.

"Do you want to wear some clothes?" Tyler offered as he helped his toddler boss stand up.

Understanding what his boss was getting at Tyler then picked up and handed the badger doctor the balled up used baby diaper for her sample, which she reluctantly took with a hint of disgust.

“Well that worked out nicely” Lionheart giggled as the older lion shouldered the duffel bag and picked him up. “I’ll check in on your progress again in a week’s time. Until then don’t contact me unless it’s absolutely important!” he called out as he was carried away, leaving behind a stunned looking badger holding a poopy diaper. After walking down a few long hallways and taking an elevator the two exited the building which turned out to be the University of Zootopia. He had secretly rented out one of their labs for Dr. Honey Badger to create the youth serum.

Walking across the parking lot to their car Tyler opened the backseat door to reveal a car seat, something he had set up earlier when he got the changing supplies. Setting the lion cub into the seat he quickly strapped him in securely with the seat belts, one of which ran between his legs and over his padded crotch. Once he finished Tyler pulled a pacifier out of his pocket and stuck it Lionheart’s mouth, the baby accepting the rubber nipple gratefully. He then proceeded to suckle on it as Tyler climbed into the driver’s seat, started up the car and drove them away. During the car ride through the city Lionheart felt himself getting sleepy as he nursed his pacifier and ended up dozing off.

He was then woken up half an hour later by Tyler and saw they were back at city hall. “Come on sleepy head, time to go back to work.”

Lionheart merely mumbled in response as he was unbuckled from the car seat and carried into the building. The duo got a couple of odd looks from people walking by but no one said anything, that is until they reached his secretary’s desk. The female snow leopard eyed the toddler with uncertainty until Tyler convinced her that this was Lionheart’s nephew and that the boss gave the ok for him to be here. Once that was settled they entered his office and he was promptly set down in his big chair, with an added booster seat so he could reach his desk.

The lion cub then sighed as he was then forced to deal with a pile of paperwork he had been neglecting, which Tyler had reminded him of and he had responded to with a cute pout. Even though all they need was his signature for approval it was still tedious work, something he had previous forced off on Bellwether. Actually most of the physical part of his job was just signing stuff which made him confident he could continue to do as a two year old toddler.

Once he finished the last form Lionheart slumped back in his seat as he silently pondered what to do next…

The fox lifted his arms up in a half-hearted shrug, “What can I say, when ya gotta go, ya gotta go.”

“Look’s like the dumb fox has become the stinky fox” Judy chuckled before hopping off the changing table, “Alright come on we better be getting home, otherwise knowing you we’ll be talking until tomorrow comes around” she said shoulder her diaper backpack and making for the exit. “Hey I don’t talk that much” Nick retorted before reaching down and pulling his pants back up and over his full diaper, quickly redoing his belt before following his fellow officer out of the restroom.

As they walked across the large empty atrium of the station Judy quickly took the lead so as not to be downwind of the fox. Despite the build in odor guards Nick was starting to stink a little.

“When we get in the car you’re rolling down the windows” she commented as they reached the double doors.

“Oh come it’s not that bad” Nick retorted with a pout.

He on the other hand liked the foul smell rising up from his backside.

The two exited the building and got into their designated police cruiser. As Nick climbed into the driver seat he let out a slight moan as he sat down on the seat of his full diaper, his large poo squishing and mushing up against his bottom. Moving around a little he caused his mess to spread around, and to him it felt like he was sitting in thick warm mud. It was a feeling like now other and one that he greatly enjoyed whereas others would be disgusted.

“Wow you seem to really be enjoying yourself there” Judy teased as she watched from the passenger seat.

Nick gave the bunny a sly smile before putting the key in the ignition and starting her up, putting the car in gear and driving out of the parking lot. Remembering Judy’s request he rolled down the windows a bit as they cruised down the streets. The drive through the city was pretty quiet for the two who just sat in silence. After a few minutes of driving Nick felt the urge to pee and calmly released his bladder into his diaper, soaking the front of his garment with his yellow liquid. Thankfully he didn’t end up flooding it but rather wet it enough for it to become puffy, not wanting to risking leaking on the seat.

Out of the corner of his eye he saw Judy’s left ear give a subtle twitch, silently wondering if the rabbit heard him peeing his pants. If she did she didn’t say anything as she continued to watch the buildings pass by with a neutral expression. Meanwhile Judy wrinkled her nose a little at the stench of her partner’s dirty diaper, wondering if she should have made him change before they left. She then remembered that Nick currently didn’t have any diapers on him at the moment, and her were too small to fit the fox’s wide frame meaning that a change wouldn’t have been possible. Seeing as this was unavoidable the bunny sat back and tolerated the odor coming from the fox next to her. Not that she couldn’t handle it having dealt with plenty of messy diapers of her own, it was just a different experience when it was someone else’s. Eventually she’d get used to Nick’s stinky diapers.

After twenty more minutes of driving Nick and Judy finally reached their destination.

As it turned out he ended up taking her…

1213211212.content:
Judy was surprised when Nick parked the crusier outside one of the nicer apartment complexes in Savannah Central. Before she could ask the fox answered, "Sorry Carrots but since I'm the one who made a boom boom this time around my change takes priority."

Wanting to poke fun at her partner Judy teased, "Aww does little Nicky need a new diapie?"

"Why yes little Nicky does need a new diapie" he smirked back at the rabbit before tossing her the car keys, "Anyway you can take the crusier back to your apartment if you want to leave. Or you can stick around for a bit and hang out in diapers with me, your choice cottontail."

"I think I'll stay. It's not every day you find out your best friend and partner's into diapers as well" Judy replied as she pocketed the keys.

"Suit yourself"

The duo exited the crusier and entered the building to take the elevator up to the seventh floor. Judy was thankful they didn't run into anyone on their way to the fox's pad as it would have been impossible to mask or explain the foul odor coming off the vulpine's rear end. Meanwhile Nick causally sauntered down the hallway with both hands in his pockets and a smile on his face like he owned the place. He wasn't the least bit perturbed by the messy state of his underwear or the smell.

Opening the door to his apartment Judy marveled at how high end it was which was to be expected given how much tax free money the fox made with his cons or the past twenty years. It was much better than living out of Finnick's van under a bridge that's for sure. There was a spacious living room complete with large flat screen tv, a medium sized kitchen, two bedrooms, and a fancy bathroom complete with sink, shower, tub and of course a toilet. Given that Nick wore diapers 24/7 she was sure he didn't use the porcelain throne at all. And Judy herself didn't plan to either.

After closing and locking the door behind him Nick took three steps forward and began to unbutton the shirt of his uniform. Tossing it to the floor he then loosened his belt, "As usual make yourself at home. You can sit on the couch and watch tv if you want while I go get changed" he said as his pants dropped to the floor unceremoniously revealing his soiled padding to the world once again, Nick now completely naked save for the babyish garment strapped about his waist. The front of the fox's diaper was tinged a bright yellow from the car ride wetting while the poop bulge in the seat had been flattened down due to him sitting. But again the not so subtle scent in the air told that Nick was dirty down there.

Seeing that the rabbit was staring at his padded bottom Nick gave his rear a wiggle before stepping out of discarded pants. He then made his way to his bedroom with a slight waddle looking like an overgrown toddler. Once the vulpine was out of sight did Judy break out of her trance. Deciding to take Nick's advice she went over and plopped her furry butt on the couch and was just about to reach for the remote to turn on the tv when another idea came to her.

"Nick's in the middle of changing his diaper right now" Judy mused in her mind, "And come to think of it he technically did walk in on me during mine. I should be able to walk in on his, after all it's only fair."

Grinning evilly to herself she hopped down and practically skipped over to Nick's bedroom door. Lucky for her the fox didn't close it completely and she was able to peek inside.

Judy then noticed that Nick's room was...

1223.content:
A new form of corrective action has sprung up overnight, it was taking volunteers and those who did could see their prison scentence shortened immensely. Dawn Bellwether takes the opportunity immediately. But to her dismay she finds herself not only in an awkward position but on the short end of experimental drug testing.

Dawn succeeded in taking over Zootopia for the prey species, all predators either being put away, or placed into predator safe locations. Now the mayor of Zootopia the woman begins to make some very odd changes to the city.
1223.title: Other

12231.content:
Dawn Bellwether was far from enjoying her stay in prison. Not because of it being a hostile environment, the little sheep had relatively little trouble with anyone else. Partially due to her charming nature, and no one wanted anything to do with her at all for the most part. Because of this she managed to go under the radar of many of the other prisoners. She'd been doing some looking, and she had discovered an odd program. She wasn't sure on the exact details but she knew that by participating in it she could reduce her sentence immensely.

The day of the program came around and as she was signed up guards came to her cell. There was no interaction with them, she was bound and had her eyes covered. Being carted off somewhere, where exactly she didn't know, but where ever it was it would likely end up being better for her in the long run.

After what seemed like several hours of waiting Dawn found herself strapped into some chair in a medical facility of some sorts after she was unblinded. She struggled a little, but there was no getting out right now. She looked around, no one around her for the moment, there was a doorway she could look out, but it only showed a small amount of hall. But suddenly a creature came through. A cheetah of some kind, wearing doctors clothing. The doctor came in, looking at a chart before saying.

"Dawn Bellwether." in a somewhat feminine voice.

The cheetah approached Dawn, looking down at her and smiling widely.

"You don't know how much I'm going to enjoy this." the cheetah said.

Before Dawn could form any sort of reaction, she felt a sharp prick in the side of her thigh, looking over to see the cheetah had stuck her with a needle of some sort. She struggled again, but not even as long as she had before when she felt oddly fatigued. Her limbs felt as if they were going numb, and soon her eyes closed as she fell unconscious.
